Projects

Nucamp Site

Full stack web and mobile application. Users can explore, review, and register for campsites.

Created throughout the Nucamp Bootcamp course. Front end built with three separate technologies: Bootstrap, React, and React Native. Back end built using NodeJS with Express framework and MongoDB with Mongoose.

Water Dragon Refresh

Website. Allows users to explore information on Water Dragon lizards.

Inspired by a personal favorite, but dated, website. Built with the intention to practice two separate technologies: Bootstrap and React.

Face Off

Browser-based game. Find the extra face.

Created after a four week Nucamp Bootcamp course on web fundamentals of HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. DOM manipulation logic was part of the bootcamp culminating exercise. Buttons, notifications, animations, and other features added as part of personal exploration.

Education

Nucamp Coding Bootcamp

Certificate of Completion

Full Stack Web and Mobile Development

26 week coding boot-camp focused on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals followed by Full Stack Web + Mobile Development technologies.

Course material and projects span the breadth of web and app development through responsive web design with Bootstrap, web development with React (including JavaScript ES6 and React-Redux concepts), mobile development with React Native and Expo SDK, back end with Node.js and Express, and databases and storage with MongoDB. Courses made heavy use of Visual Studio Code development environment, NPM package manager, and Git & GitHub.

Experience

Mechanical Manufacturing Engineer II

Quality Electrodynamics

As a mechanical manufacturing engineer, I lead cross-functional teams and delivered long term strategic projects as well as technical solutions to day-to-day issues on the manufacturing lines. Responsible for process validation, process improvement, and mechanical engineering tasks within the Manufacturing Engineering department. Lean Leader and Project Leader for Surface Mount Technology and Fused Deposition Modeling departments.

August 2018 - June 2020

R&D Engineer II, R&D Engineer I, R&D Associate Engineer

ConMed Corporation

As an R&D engineer, I brought medical devices from concept to commercialization. Responsible for project management, assessing user needs, writing resulting engineering specifications, developing & testing prototypes, and final product acceptance testing. Leader of daily engineering tasks as well as cross-functional communication and management.

May 2012 - August 2018

Coltene/Whaledent, Inc.

Full-time support for Document Control, Product Development, and Manufacturing departments. Responsible for completion of technical tasks for time sensitive projects and initiatives.

Interests

When I'm not learning about coding or putting that knowledge to use by creating exciting and useful applications, I love to be eating exciting and flavorful foods. The more exotic the better!

I can also be found (or, if I'm doing it right, not found) out in the bush hiking, kayaking, camping, and fishing. Picking a spot on the map, charting a course, and venturing out for a few consecutive days is the ultimate gratification for that burning wanderlust urge!
